Not amazing food but great vibe!Very chill. Perfect for vino and people watching if you're alone. What's outstanding here is their warmed cheese. It's not on the menu but just ask for it. Cheese melted in the oven, drizzled with olive oil and served with hot crunchy bread. Nothing more satisfying with a red. I couldn't stop thinking of it and went back for more and the second time they served up a smellier melted blue. In heaven!
